title: CanvasFlip
description: Sync and generate specs from sketch artboards to CanvasFlip.
author: CanvasFlip

title: Open Color Plugin for Sketch
description: A sketch plugin to support the open color file format
author: OpenColor

title: Optically for Sketch
description: Automated and mathematically precise optical adjustments in Sketch.
author: Vlad Danilov

title: PaintCode Code Generator
description: Convert your Sketch drawings into Swift or Objective-C
author: PixelCut

title: Smartling
description: Plugin for Sketch that allows to translate and pseudo-localize designs using the Smartling platform.

title: 7 Columns Calendar Creator
description: An easy-to-use plugin that allows you to generate a 7 Columns Calendar for any month
author: lstore.graphics

title: Abstract
description: Abstract is a file management and version control tool for Sketch files
author: Abstract

title: Sympli
description: Perfect your collaboration with Sympli. Share specs and assets, then inspect designs and make pixel-perfect apps faster online or with plugins for Android Studio and Xcode.
author: Sympli

title: Plot
description: Collaborate with your design team in a new way
author: Jordan Singer

title: Symbols Manager
description: A fast and easy way to manage all your symbols. No more hassle with long and complex symbols name, or renaming tons of symbols because you misspelled a folder name.
author: Jaer Pollux

title: Text Styles Manager
description: A fast and easy way to manage all your Text Styles. No more hassle with long and complex names, or renaming tons of styles because you misspelled a folder name.
author: Jaer Pollux

title: Material Plugin
description: Create, customize, and share your own Material theme. Includes Material Theme Editor, plus upload and sync to Gallery.
author: Google
